droid.name: Noam Shazeer
droid.verification: Noam Shazeer is verified as the co-founder of Character.ai. He founded the company in 2021 alongside Daniel De Freitas after leaving Google. droid.name: Daniel De Freitas
droid.verification: Daniel De Freitas is confirmed as the co-founder of Character.ai along with Noam Shazeer. He is a former Google engineer who was the lead designer of Meena, which later became LaMDA (Language Model for Dialogue Applications). He left Google in 2021 to start Character.ai and recently returned to Google in August 2024 as part of a licensing deal between the two companies.
